content: {"name": "mRelief SNAP Screener - Washington DC", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Families need to complete the 2024-25 school meal & summer EBT application to receive summer benefits ($120 per eligible child)- name spelling, address, etc. all need to be up to date and accurate! Summer EBT Outreach Toolkit\" https://www.dchunger.org/federal-nutrition-programs/sun-bucks-summer-ebt/\nGo to https://apply.mrelief.com/screener or text \"Food\" to 74544 to check eligibility.\n", "email": "", "url": "https://apply.mrelief.com/screener", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "", "address_2": null, "city": "Washington", "state_province": "DC", "postal_code": "20002", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 38.9001734, "longitude": -77.0018736}}
